title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2526.3 - Injunctions by Supreme Court
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2526.3 - Injunctions by Supreme Court

State Regulations

The DHCR may commence proceedings in the Supreme Court to
enjoin violations of the RSL, this Code, or orders issued pursuant thereto. In
any such proceedings, the DHCR shall not be required to post
bond. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2526.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
